body.p: In developing the revised recognition criteria, the Board aimed to develop tools that would help it to base decisions on a more coherent set of principles. It did not have an objective of either increasing or decreasing the range of assets and liabilities recognised. Paragraphs BC5.15–BC5.20 provide the Board’s responses to specific concerns in relation to situations when probability of inflows or outflows of economic benefits is low and paragraphs BC5.21–BC5.22 provide the Board’s responses to specific concerns in relation to measurement uncertainty.
